subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Bryan Bickell and Michal Handzus scored on consecutive shots in the second period as the Chicago Blackhawks defeated the Los Angeles Kings in Game 2 of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Bryan Bickell and Michal Handzus scored on consecutive shots in the second period as the Chicago Blackhawks defeated the Los Angeles Kings in Game 2 of the Western Conference finals.
